extension.summary: Nakamori Plugin enables you to browse your JMM collection within Kodi.
extension.description: Nakamori Plugin enables you to browse your JMM collection within Kodi without needing to reimport it in anyway. Thanks to this approach you are able to still manage your collection with JMM and use information you gathered there to pass them to Kodi.

extension.disclaimer: Remember to change IP address in settings if your JMM Server is not on the same computer as Kodi.
